summary: About my hat for Dolores Umbridge
title: About my hat for Dolores Umbridge
body:
This one, I mean. For others this might be a bit random, but I got an anonymous question about it. So, to answer it: I actually made it myself.

I had bought the type of hat I needed (I think it is called a pillbox?), and draped it over with dual-toned (pink and silver on the each side), bit ruffled fabric. I made it purposely thicker and a bit uneven on some parts. After that, I made some flowers, got some beads and sew them on.

It was quite easy, if you have trouble finding what you need. Good luck for your quest, anyway! :>

summary: Howling with pain, the troll twisted and flailed its club, with Harry clinging on for dear life; any second, the troll was going...
body:
Howling with pain, the troll twisted and flailed its club, with Harry clinging on for dear life; any second, the troll was going to rip him off or catch him a terrible blow with the club.

Hermione had sunk to the floor in fright; Ron pulled out his own wand – not knowing what he was going to do he heard himself cry the first spell that came into his head: “Wingardium Leviosa!”

And helloooooo Book Ron, you resourceful and competent wizard and beautiful intuitive compassionate person you <3

(For the record, I think Movie Ron is a beautiful person too, and Rupert Grint did wonderfully with the hand he was dealt – out of the Trio, he’s probably my favourite fit for the role – but Book Ron deserved better screenwriting and I had no idea to which extent until this reread. In the movie, he’s all but clueless and Harry and Hermione actually have to instruct him before he does the spell. In the book, it’s all Ron. And that’s just the tip of the iceberg.)

reblog.comment:

In the movie, he’s all but clueless and Harry and Hermione actually have to instruct him before he does the spell. In the book, it’s all Ron. And that’s just the tip of the iceberg.)

(For the record, I think Movie Ron is a beautiful person too, and Rupert Grint did wonderfully with the hand he was dealt – out of the Trio, he’s probably my favourite fit for the role – but Book Ron deserved better screenwriting and I had no idea to which extent until this reread. In the movie, he’s all but clueless and Harry and Hermione actually have to instruct him before he does the spell. In the book, it’s all Ron. And that’s just the tip of the iceberg.)
trail.content:
Howling with pain, the troll twisted and flailed its club, with Harry clinging on for dear life; any second, the troll was going to rip him off or catch him a terrible blow with the club.

Hermione had sunk to the floor in fright; Ron pulled out his own wand – not knowing what he was going to do he heard himself cry the first spell that came into his head: “Wingardium Leviosa!”

And helloooooo Book Ron, you resourceful and competent wizard and beautiful intuitive compassionate person you <3

(For the record, I think Movie Ron is a beautiful person too, and Rupert Grint did wonderfully with the hand he was dealt – out of the Trio, he’s probably my favourite fit for the role – but Book Ron deserved better screenwriting and I had no idea to which extent until this reread. In the movie, he’s all but clueless and Harry and Hermione actually have to instruct him before he does the spell. In the book, it’s all Ron. And that’s just the tip of the iceberg.)

summary: Why , just why are most of you so upset about the Nagini thing on the new Fantastic Beasts trailer ? We just got to see like two...
body:
Why , just why are most of you so upset about the Nagini thing on the new Fantastic Beasts trailer ? We just got to see like two seconds of a two hour movie !! We can’t know anything that’s going to happen. There are so many questions that this movie and maybe the other three will answer. All of you are just assuming that it’s not gonna make sense when we still no nothing.

And honestly that thing about “ having an Asian girl playing that character is racist “ what is wrong with you ? It’s an amazing actress who auditioned for the role and did and amazing job and got the part. That’s it. There’s nothing else behind it. I’m sure if she didn’t want to play that chatracter she wouldn’t even audition on the first place.

summary: Hey guys, I was wondering if anyone knew how to help me out? I want to learn this font as I'm teaching myself calligraphy at the...
body: Hey guys, I was wondering if anyone knew how to help me out? I want to learn this font as I’m teaching myself calligraphy at the moment, but I can only find these two photos. I found one on the potion ingredients wiki. I was wondering if anyone knew anything about this? Or knows anyones that does typography and could make up the rest of the alphabet (for money even), i guess? I don’t really I know I just really love it! Please help if you can! Thanks!

summary: Look, if someone would ever told me that the crack fics with crazy plots (Bellatrix and Voldemort having a child in the canon...
body:
Look, if someone would ever told me that the crack fics with crazy plots (Bellatrix and Voldemort having a child in the canon universe, Harry being a dick to his son and McGonagall because ‘SLyThERin aRe EviL’/'YoU DoN’t HaVe KiDs’, Nagini being a human, crazy time travel/AU, etc) and questionable quality were actually going to become canon I wouldn’t had done a stupid amount of research in the Potteruniverse to make sure my fiction (never wrotted)was possible in the laws of the universe.

At this rate My Immortal is going to be the most canon accurate fanfiction of the franchise
